title: 7.1 screen invalid format
body: Try to get into game but met with my screen disconnecting from my computer saying invalid format but assoon as i quit the game aka alt tabbing or alt f4 ing it goes back to normal

replies.body: I am having the exact same problem out of no where. I completely uninstalled League and deleted every fold related to it. Re installed everything.. Still have the same problem!!! I re install all my graphic drivers..tried different resolutions and different monitors.. different accoutns. NOTHING IS WORKING PLZ HELP  feelsverybadman

It seems like this is a rather new error. Please try the troubleshooting steps provided in the following post:

http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/VJeqP4UK-fullscreen-issueout-of-range-issue
